snippet.title: Pilot G2 Pen - How many sentences? (This pen writes a lot)
snippet.description:
I wanted to see how many sentences the Pilot G2 could write... So I put it to the test! See how many I ended up getting :)

This really is a great pen, I'd highly recommend it to anyone! Just make sure you keep em in a safe place, your friends will try to steal them. I like the size 10 because the ball feels smoother on the paper than the size 07. 

Pilot G2 pen: https://amzn.to/2CynLJK

Thanks for watching, you're amazing! -

7 Tips on How To Think Like a Programmer: https://manychat.com/l2/102224234605534
New Programmer Support: https://www.facebook.com/groups/616837729085352
